nodes.text: The Circle Route was a transportation route around and through the Jundland Wastes on Tatooine. Transports leaving from the Transport Depot in Mos Eisley traveled the Circle Route every three days, not counting frequent delays and cancellations. The direction of travel alternated, with one transport heading South to West along the route, then the next heading West to South, taking the route in reverse. The route began at Mos Eisley, traveled around the Jundland Wastes to Anchorhead, then through Arnthout Pass to Motesta and Arnthout, north to Bestine, and then again to Mos Eisley.
